message.body: Hey!! I know, it's been too long! That would be great :) I got some crazy news at work this week, my job will go away at some point this year
Let me know when's good for you! xo
Oh geez! What a nightmare!! Well I've got a barn worker opening available come April!!! ;) maybe a you're interested I a little fill in work/summer fun while you regroup!?

Yeah we shall see! Lots of uncertainty about the timing still, I'll tell ya all about it. Happy hour/dinner might be easier actually! I can be back up this way around 6 one day this week, weds or thurs maybe?
I'm meeting Jill on my way home from work on wed. Do y want to do a group thing? Or just the two of us?
Happy to do either or both! Want me to check in with Jill about weds?
Sounds good! I can't get there until closer to 6 though, is that ok? Piper gets
Ok, yeah, totally fine. We'll order your drink and have it waiting for u!
